
# Using this package

This package contains SDL3_image built for x64 Windows.

To use this package, simply replace an existing 64-bit SDL3_image.dll with the one included here.

You can include support for additional image formats by including the license and DLL files in the optional directory in your application. They will be automatically loaded by SDL_image as needed.

# Development packages

If you're looking for packages with headers and libraries, you can download one of these:
-  SDL3_image-devel-3.2.4-VC.zip, for development using Visual Studio
-  SDL3_image-devel-3.2.4-mingw.zip, for development using mingw-w64
